td.content: s:pt complains of mild easy bruising, mild non pruritic rash and mild menorrhagia. NKDA. pt is a 29 yr old white female. o:Height 59 in, Weight 104 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC.

s:a female baker aged 30 Ys presents with Kidney. denies any alcohol use Patient does not smoke o:Height 60 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, Basic Metabolic Panel Creatinine=2.5 mg/dL,BUN=35 mg/dl,glucose=80 mg/dL,calcium=8 mg/dL, Sodium, Urine Na=43 meq/L, FENa FENa=2 % a:Acute Renal Failure p:administered AVAPRO - 150 mg by mouth daily, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Sodium, Urine, FENa, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 59 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed AVAPRO - 150 mg by mouth daily.

s:f baker aged 31 yrs presents with increased mild easy bruising, mild non pruritic rash and mild menorrhagia over 16 months. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she denies smoking o:Height 60 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 40 mg daily x 4 days, and ordered CBC.

s:female baker aged 31 yrs with Mental Health. she has had several such episodes over past 13 months. o:Height 60 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 18 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed risperidone - 1 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mental Status exam.
